Shadowcaster heard the alarms and raced into the CR
chamber- why was it that in a time of Peace, the
Maximals still had their auto-defense system up and
running? He just knew there was going to be trouble.

Squeezing into the corridors, he quickly made his way
into the CR Chamber. Cooley but authoratively he
commanded "Calm down- ALL of you. This IS a time when
all factions are united as was just said, however as a
united race Rodimus doesn't come into this Kup. Now
why don't you all show some respect for Primus and
STAND DOWN!"

The look in his eye showed he was not taking this
situation lightly. 

 --- Jerame Johnson <jeramej@...> wrote: >
Cooley:
> Droping out of The cloaked watch he has been doing
> on the CR. "Hold up all of you, I have been watching
> her and the reason why the alarms went off is
> becouse no one was watching the timer. Now where
> they. She was badly injured and was brought here by
> Malice and Wolfboy. Now Back off you two." Cooley
> looks at Winlord and Kup. then to KitKat, "As for
> you I got a close eye on you. Little miss. Besides
> you still owe me one." He smiles.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
> Windlord/Kup::
> 
> Windlord arrived to CR's rooms and he looked KitKat
> and 
> shouted"FREEZE!!!! how you dare come in our base,
> PRED!!!"
> 
> "Hold on, Windlord"said Kup "We should interogate
> her first... 
> WE... "
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "shadowess_azogoth" 
> <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> > KitKat::
> > 
> > She took a few steps  back and growled at the
> door.  She could 
> smell 
> > maximals and didn't want a confrontation. But knew
> it was 
> unavoidable.
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000"

> DeathStar
> > >

> > >

> > > Elita woke up and cried aloud scared of that
> noise while 
> Nighlight 
> > > huged her and looked around.
> > > 
> > > Death Starlooked awared looking for the intruder
> guessing that

> > >

> out what's goin 
> on
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com,
> "shadowess_azogoth" 
> > > <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> > > > KitKat::
> > > > 
> > > > She finally stretched and awoke fully in the
> CR chamber.  She 
> > > watched 
> > > > as the links and connections disengaged and
> the chamer opened 
> up 
> > > for 
> > > > her.  She stepped out and looked around. Her
> nose told her she 
> > > wasn't 
> > > > in a pred base.  She transformed into wolf
> mode and started 
> BASE 
> > > > INTRUDER ALERT STARTED SOUNDING OFF.  She
> closed her optics 
> and 
> > > > winces, "Damn, this just isn't my eon is it?"
> she muttered and 
> > > > prepared for battle.
